episodes.title: How a Teenage Girl Started Finland's Most Notorious Cult
episodes.description:
What makes hundreds of people sell their homes, leave their families… and follow a teenage girl who claims to speak for God?

In 1920s Finland, Maria Åkerblom rose from poverty to become one of the most controversial cult leaders in Scandinavian history. Preaching in a trance-like state, Maria attracted hundreds of devoted followers — many of whom gave up everything to follow her.

This is the strange and unsettling story of Maria Åkerblom — a girl worshipped as a prophet, feared as a manipulator, and remembered as one of the most mysterious figures in Finnish history.
